title: Operation Cybersnare
text:
Operation Cybersnare was a <a href="United%20States%20Secret%20Service">United States Secret Service</a> operation in 1995 targeted at <a href="hacker%20%28computer%20security%29">computer hackers</a>.
In January 1995, the Secret Service set up an undercover <a href="bulletin%20board%20system">bulletin board system</a> in <a href="Bergen%20County">Bergen County</a>, <a href="New%20Jersey">New Jersey</a>. This was the first undercover Internet sting of its kind. With the help of an undercover informant, they advertised the bulletin board across the Internet. The topics for discussion were <a href="cellular%20telephone">cellular telephone</a> cloning and computer hacking.
In September, twelve raids across the country resulted in the arrest of six hackers. From the press release, those arrested were:
